priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Menopause Status Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C185847

self.title: CDISC SDTM Menopause Status Response Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the responses for the status of a female with respect to menopause.
name: Menopause Status Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Menopause Status Response Terminology

terms.definition: The 10 or so years immediately prior to menopause when the subject experiences symptoms of menopause.
The period of time after menopause.
The period of time before perimenopause.
